events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I would like to request a refund because it doesn't fit properly.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to a sizing problem with the purchased jacket.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you further.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund request. I'll be happy to help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in original condition?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. The jacket has not been worn and still has all tags attached.
Thank you. We can proceed with your refund request. Please send the jacket back using our prepaid return label.
That sounds great, I appreciate the prepaid label for the return. I will send it back as soon as possible.
We have generated the prepaid return label and emailed it to you. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the return label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and sent the jacket back yesterday. Looking forward to the refund, thank you!
We have processed your refund as the returned jacket has arrived at our warehouse. You should see the amount credited shortly.
Thank you for your patience. Your refund case is now closed. Please reach out if you need any further help.
We have sent you a survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is very important to us.
